website_summaries.verdict: The Nikon Coolpix S9700 camera packs a 30x zoom lens into a compact body with Wi-Fi. Its image quality earns Editors' Choice honors.

customer_reviews.title: I really liked this camera BUT on trying out this camera it ...
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this camera BUT on trying out this camera it worked fine. After charging the battery it powered down when focussing. Next day doing some pictures the same thing happened it powered down and all functions froze. Had to remove the battery and wait 10 minutes then replaced the battery and it powered up. Serious fault somewhere in the hardware. Shame takes quality pictures. I returned the camera because of the powering down problem and ordered a Sony A5000L. Opening the Sony package it was sealed with their secure sticker. The Nikon arrived with the internal Nikon box open. This is suspicious. I think I was sold a second or grey good.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Dean

customer_reviews.title: Early death.
customer_reviews.text: It was a lovely camera while it lasted... but it died 2 years after purchase. At this price this wasn't good enough. Quality of pictures was excellent and delivered all it said it would - for the first 18 months and then started to spring small problems like a fuzzy zoom. And eventually would only open for business with the dial between modes.Now it has turned up its toes and doesn't take any images at all, I just get white screens.
customer_reviews.author: Esther G

customer_reviews.title: A brilliant little camera
customer_reviews.text: A brilliant little camera, takes amazing quality pictures as good as many D.S.L.R.'s yet still fits into your pocket. I used its 30 times zoom to take a picture of the moon (just for fun) and it took a very passable photo showing the craters quite clearly. One slightly annoying thing it can be a little awkward to hold, as the most comfortable position puts one hand on top of the flash and the other on the movie button, once you learn not to do this the little camera is to me faultless.
customer_reviews.author: wayne  mccormick

customer_reviews.title: picture capture is are not always perfect.
customer_reviews.text: doesnt always give you the best pictures usually the pics are worse than my 5yr pentax that it was meant to replace. you really have to hold the camera still and then take a picture on automatic. Anywhere thats theres a little movement and the camera gives very blurry pics. the HD Movie capture works well - much better than my old panasonic digital video recorder. so thats one less item to take on holidays.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: I love this camera
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera, it was everything I wanted. It is not too big, it takes excellent photos, especially in low light. I have been totally impressed. The only thing that took some getting used to is the pop up flash wich comes up exactly under where my hand holds the camera! I have already taken some great shots. Zoom is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Takes good photos in various lighting
customer_reviews.text: Point and shoot capable. Takes good photos in various lighting. The button is sensitive, so it might open in your purse if you do not put it in a case. But then, what sort of weirdo puts an expensive piece of kit in their hand bag or pocket with no case.
customer_reviews.author: ev

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Camera arrived in good pack. Unfortunately, I can hardly use it, as the flash keeps getting either stuck or opening without any control and difficult to push it back..!!! Disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: James Bond

customer_reviews.title: ... - this turns out to be an even more amazing compact camera with a zoom to die for
customer_reviews.text: Bought to replace my beloved olympus that bit the dust in a Brazilian puddle - this turns out to be an even more amazing compact camera with a zoom to die for. Last weekend I go a close up of a friend on the opposite side of Old Trafford from me! Awesome.
customer_reviews.author: DrLin

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: How glad I am that I listened to Which - who put it at the top of their 'Best Buy' list for compact cameras and gave it an enthusiastic write up - and not to the critics. This is a marvellous piece of kit at a very reasonable price and I recommend it to anyone looking for a very good, very versatile compact camera.
customer_reviews.author: Barnacle Bill

customer_reviews.title: Great value, superb quality Nikon
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant little camera, which I was tempted to buy because it was Which Report no 1 Best Buy. I have found it to be very versatile, love the 30 X optical zoom, superfast startup means you don't miss those instant type moments.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Z

customer_reviews.title: The camera is the best purchase I have made
customer_reviews.text: The camera is the best purchase I have made, but the only thing is the flash but you switch the camera on you have go switch the flash off.
customer_reviews.author: mr j flannagan

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommended
customer_reviews.text: Great little camera. Bought as a gift for my mum to replace a point and shoot model. The "scene" modes on this are genuinely useful and the ability to shoot manually is a great option to have
customer_reviews.author: Mr M

customer_reviews.title: I am delighted with this camera
customer_reviews.text: I am delighted with this camera. The definition at magnification of 30 is astonishing but I've had my finger moved out of the way a number of times by the awkwardly positioned flash - reason for 4 star.
customer_reviews.author: MR. JOHN ELLWOOD

customer_reviews.title: Good little camera with a super zoom and functions similar ...
customer_reviews.text: Good little camera with a super zoom and functions similar to a digital SLR, but the pop-up flash is annoying, flimsy and not particularly good at it's job
customer_reviews.author: STARS Grafix

customer_reviews.title: zoom lens motor goes wild
customer_reviews.text: Having charged the battery, I switched it on, and alarmingly, the lens keeps coming in and out. The the motor for the zoom lens is jammed making an awful noise. The only way to switch it off is to remove the battery.
customer_reviews.author: Ipaduser

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera ...
customer_reviews.text: For they money this is a great little camera. Very easy to use. Quality sharp and clear photographs. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JamesB

customer_reviews.title: OK, picture quality disappointed
customer_reviews.text: GPS is quick to pick up and the zoom works well. The photo quality is not brilliant. My nexus 6 actually takes better pics. The WiFi connection is not brilliant and keeps failing.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: It's great but as a novice I know I have loads ...
customer_reviews.text: It's great but as a novice I know I have loads to learn to get the very beset reults. I consulted two of my friends who are very good at camera skills and they both recommended this camera.
customer_reviews.author: DianeH

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be a very good camera, the only reason for not giving it ...
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a very good camera, the only reason for not giving it a 5 star rating is the flash - the position of it always seems to be under your finger, it always pops up and is very flimsy - otherwise spot on camera.
customer_reviews.author: Shipmate127

customer_reviews.title: Shame because it was recommended in the May 2015 edition of Which magazine but ...
customer_reviews.text: After unpacking the camera and firing up the battery, we tried to take a close-up of an insect and the shutter jammed and made an unpleasant noise. I have had to send it back. Shame because it was recommended in the May 2015 edition of Which magazine but has already been discontinued.
customer_reviews.author: kristin wade

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it! So amny things to get used to, but it takes excellent pictures
customer_reviews.author: Alan Crook

customer_reviews.title: Best zoom currently out there in convenient-size package
customer_reviews.text: Excellent camera with superb zoom. Niggle about needing to turn on camera fully in order to view stored pictures.
customer_reviews.author: LL Customer

customer_reviews.title: The camera is good. My only criticism is the position of the ...
customer_reviews.text: The camera is good. My only criticism is the position of the flash - it is just where I want to hold the camera and therefore it will not pop up. Fortunately, it does give you the message to allow it to operate. otherwise a very good piece of equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Alan McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant piece of kit
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely as described. Wonderfully easy to use, taking brilliant pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Haynes

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Superb bit of kit. Gives the options of manual mode as well as aperture & shutter priorities, and not just scene modes found on some cheaper models.
customer_reviews.author: A. D. Sams

customer_reviews.title: Easy Peasy Photography
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I understand what is said about the pop up flash being where you tend to hold the camera but it's something you can get used to. Has anyone out there actually managed to thread the wrist strap through?
customer_reviews.author: mrs. j dibnah

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love the camera, so easy to use, ideal for a beginner and not too heavy
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Great zoom.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this camera. Had a previous model with x14 zoom which was very good but this is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: pedrostub

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: No complaints at all. Does all I could ever want and more.
customer_reviews.author: ibeales

customer_reviews.title: I've lost it !
customer_reviews.text: Great neat camera, so much so that my brother has nicked it !!!
customer_reviews.author: Seasider

customer_reviews.title: Results so far are very good. Wi fi connection procedure too complicated so have ...
customer_reviews.text: Still getting used to it. Results so far are very good. Wi fi connection procedure too complicated so have not been able to set it up.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Clarke

customer_reviews.title: really good camera, terrific definition light and compact for the ...
customer_reviews.text: really good camera, terrific definition light and compact for the range of zoom etc. Only criticism is the flash which pops up where your left hand holds the camera. You do get used to it but it should be in a better position.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Holroyd

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant camera. Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant camera. Very pleased. Have seen reviews with issues about the flash and other buttons being to close think this might be an issue for men or those with larger fingers.
customer_reviews.author: Beverley Collings

customer_reviews.title: Flashy camera!
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. Loving using it. Only very minor problem is I occasionally move dial without meaning to. Great value for money
customer_reviews.author: G. Burns

customer_reviews.title: briliant
customer_reviews.text: Good camera the GPS and wireless are features you didnt know you would use until you have them.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: ... it a few times the camera seems to be good, the only thing is the charger (USB) is ...
customer_reviews.text: Only used it a few times the camera seems to be good, the only thing is the charger (USB) is for the U.S. or the European market not the UK market and requires a shaver adaptor. Terry from Torquay.
customer_reviews.author: hazel blackmore

customer_reviews.title: Sound purchase,good value.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value better than expected as yet not found any problems other than the amount of paper, ink and time to down load a copy of the instruction manual
customer_reviews.author: Watty

customer_reviews.title: ... not used it but in every way it looks good,
customer_reviews.text: The camera arrived on the correct date and so far have not used it but in every way it looks good,
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Barbara Kennard

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product not working properly, did not get much help from product support
customer_reviews.author: Mr. R. Daly

customer_reviews.title: Mind your fingers
customer_reviews.text: Just one complaint. The pop-up flash is exactly where my finger sits.
customer_reviews.author: Mr

customer_reviews.title: Nikon Quality.
customer_reviews.text: For a compact,brilliant but it needs a lens hood for long focus ..
customer_reviews.author: david griffiths

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says on the tin.
customer_reviews.text: Slightly bigger than expected, but works very well under all conditions Sharp images & zoom is spectacular. Other reviewers have grumbled about the pop up flash, & I agree it can be irritating. I had thought that if you selected "no flash" in the flash menu, it would be OK, & that you could just enable the flash when you need it. But unfortunately, when you turn the camera off, it reverts to the default - which is auto flash. Myriad of features, most of which I have yet to investigate. All round, good value for money
customer_reviews.author: Geoff

customer_reviews.title: disappointed after hearing such great things.
customer_reviews.text: Was dissapointed with this camera. the flash pops up on two small arms which are very flimsy, the flash also pops up under where you woud naturally hold the camera The lag from hitting the button to actually taking the photo is very very slow. the firework mode was particularly disappointing at a recent display using firework mode we managed to get 2 photos so incredibly frustrating. the anti shake mode is also quit frustrating and doesn't particularly work very well. Overall was very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: cheekyherb

customer_reviews.title: it has a great specification and does fill my needs
customer_reviews.text: I am giving 5 star, despite the flimsy looking flash and the offset tripod thread, it has a great specification and does fill my needs, which is to keep it in my pocket and grab those off the cuff opportunities; and have all the options available when I have time time to set them up, I think it will get a lot more use than the bridge cameras that do not fit in the pocket.... PS. the flash is not as flimsy as it looks and if you are prepared to carry a tripod, you may as well take a bridge or full kit....
customer_reviews.author: RichieO

customer_reviews.title: Excellent build quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent build quality, light and easily fits in your pocket. I'm a point & shoot photographer so most of the settings are beyond me, but I'm gradually learning. However, the Auto setting sorts most things out. Reference manual needs to be downloaded as the quick-start manual that comes with it is pretty basic. Probably not for the purists but easily good enough for holiday snaps etc.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Perks

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievably BRILLIANT! The best compact camera I've ever bought
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievably BRILLIANT! The best compact camera I've ever bought. The quality of my photos are stunning. Well done Nikon :)
customer_reviews.author: R. Turnbull

customer_reviews.title: Amazing zoom range and almost as many manual modes as ...
customer_reviews.text: A really high quality compact camera with lots of functions. Amazing zoom range and almost as many manual modes as a DSLR. Brilliant for using when you don't want to take a full DSLR kit with you. Quality of photos is superb.
customer_reviews.author: David A Hall

customer_reviews.title: Coolpix S9700
customer_reviews.text: Early review but seems very good so far. Little bit chunkier than I expected but still fits in a pocket if necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Deembee

customer_reviews.title: Nikon S9700
customer_reviews.text: A lovely little camera with good zoom qualities. Easy to carry and plenty of features. Good pics also.
customer_reviews.author: James Craig

customer_reviews.title: A complete waste of money:(
customer_reviews.text: Bought this just before I went to Thailand in Nov 2014. Whilst I was away the lens stuck twice, but I thought it was something I did. When I returned home I was going to return but completely forgot, due to family illness. I didn't use the camera again until I went away to tour Andalucia during April 2016. First day on holiday, ready to take loads of snaps...it dint work at all and the lens remained stuck. A complete waste of £189. Now out of warranty (my own fault I know) and now I've finally read all the reviews I find this has been a common problem.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine999

customer_reviews.title: One of the best small pocket sized cameras around I guess
customer_reviews.text: One of the best small pocket sized cameras around I guess. Bought it for its ability to upload wirelessly to my ipad
customer_reviews.author: Penmar

customer_reviews.title: Good quality camera
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had time to get used to it yet but my husband and son-in- law are both very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: westerhill

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent camera but a little more bulky than the S9500 which was ideal
customer_reviews.author: KRA 203

customer_reviews.title: I usually use a Nikon D80 digital slr but wanted ...
customer_reviews.text: I usually use a Nikon D80 digital slr but wanted a smaller camera to carry around on holiday. The S9700 did everything required of it. I have never been a fan of compact cameras but this compact compares very favourably to my dslr.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. L.

customer_reviews.title: I also have a Nikon j1 but I have to say that the Coolpix is as good, a few less functions granted but not many
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely fabulous quality pictures even in low light,I also have a Nikon j1 but I have to say that the Coolpix is as good, a few less functions granted but not many, the Coolpix offers a great 30times zoom and the colour and quality of the prints I have made are as good if not better than the nikon1 and at less than half the price
customer_reviews.author: j f phillips

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice compact digital camera easy to use with nice pictures
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. Only exception is I found it slightly bulkier than I had expected.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: This compact takes great photos from the little time I've had to play ...
customer_reviews.text: This compact takes great photos from the little time I've had to play around with it so far. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Highlander71

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really great item with a great lens. Ideal for its intended purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Jello Jazzy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Lovely camera. This was bought as a present and my fiancé loves it. Arrived very quickly too.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Natalie J Starkie

customer_reviews.title: Super camera
customer_reviews.text: We bought this camera to replace our old digital camera as this has a bigger display and a much longer zoom on it. It didn't disappoint us--we love it. We did have a little problem getting the panorama to work sometimes, but that's probably more of a learning curve thing than the fault of the camera. It's light, small, fits easily into a handbag and a joy to use!
customer_reviews.author: DAB

customer_reviews.title: great pictures and works with remote control from iPhone
customer_reviews.text: Ideal for taking on holiday ,slips into your pocket instead of taking the SLR.great pictures and works with remote control from iPhone .
customer_reviews.author: steven13

customer_reviews.title: learning
customer_reviews.text: I find this camera does all my Bridge camera does but it is so handy to have it fit in my pocket , still on a learning curve with it and had it out today for the first The camera came earlier than I expected so very pleased PS I took the camera out on a very sunny day and couldn't see the screen , a view finder would be better for sunny days , however the pictures I took are pin sharp and the zoom is amazing
customer_reviews.author: A. O'Loughlin

customer_reviews.title: Happy Snapper.
customer_reviews.text: As a professional photographer, i set my standards high when it comes to images.I was looking to buy a compact, but worthy camera to take out anytime. There is a record amount of cameras/phones on the market that can take decent shots, but what we all need is the best. The Nikon S9700 is that camera. The images it produces will knock your socks off ! So easy to use. Great zoom. Superb lowlight settings. In all, its the compact camera you should purchase if you are looking to get the best.
customer_reviews.author: Northern Snapper

customer_reviews.title: best avoided. Not only is the focus awful but ...
customer_reviews.text: An apalling camera, best avoided.Not only is the focus awful but the battery life is minimal.
customer_reviews.author: Duncan Harley

customer_reviews.title: Nikon Coolpix S9700
customer_reviews.text: Great Camera, but returned it due to my wife actually wanting another one
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Just love it, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Just love it, easy to use, great pictures, hadn't come across any problems so far and whats important to me its not a touch screen
customer_reviews.author: WM Kudlacz

customer_reviews.title: An amazing camera. Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: An amazing camera. Easy to use, light, with a large screen to aid picture-taking. Zoom facility is incredible, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Ms R J Senior

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful camera with tremendous zoom feature but I miss my ...
customer_reviews.text: A wonderful camera with tremendous zoom feature but I miss my eye viewfinder as sometimes in bright light I personally find the viewing panel difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Eric R.

customer_reviews.title: First impressions are very good. Need more time to see all the things ...
customer_reviews.text: First impressions are very good. Need more time to see all the things that the camera is capable of. The zoom is stunning and stable.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie amd Tessa

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product produces good quality pictures and very simple to set up and use in all sorts of situations! Great!
customer_reviews.author: michelle kitchen

customer_reviews.title: NOT NEW - This rating is based on the condition of the item received
customer_reviews.text: Item that arrived was clearly NOT new. Covered in scratches and scuffs and the battery was missing. Complaint made to Amazon and returned for refund. I did purchase the exact same camera elsewhere and based on that purchase I would give it 5 stars! Very easy to use - fantastic photo quality - Bridging camera style functions if you want them. Easy point and click auto setting if you don't. Video clips are also high quality but in playbacks you can hear the camera lens mechanism when zooming in and out. That said - it's a camera not a video camera!
customer_reviews.author: o0DARKKNIGHT0o

product_meta.title: Nikon Coolpix S9700 Digital Camera Kit
product_meta.description: Nikon Coolpix S9700 Digital Camera Kit
feature_bullets: 30x optical zoom lens with an incredible 25-750mm range - extendable to 60x with Dynamic Fine Zoom - puts you where the action is, so you'll be able to capture every detail

Use the Built in Wi-Fi to connect to your smart device to use it as a remote control to achieve ideal self-portraits. Or to upload and instantly share photos with family and friends via email or social media networks
Nikon's Smart Portrait System (with features including Smile Timer, Blink Proof and Red Eye Fix) helps achieve perfect portraits and reviewing images is easy on the 3.0 inch OLED screen
Early subject detection means you're always ready to shoot whilst Pre-AF shortens the autofocus time and get crisp results even at full zoom
The back-illuminated 16-megapixel CMOS system allows for sharply details photos and Full HD movies even in low light

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars73 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
